resource_dependency.featuredArticlesDataSchema: Database table 'articles' with fields: id (UUID), title (string), summary (text), author_id (foreign key to users.id), created_at (timestamp), is_featured (boolean).
resource_dependency.featuredSolutionsDataSchema: Database table 'solutions' with fields: id (UUID), title (string), problem_summary (text), author_id (foreign key to users.id), created_at (timestamp), is_featured (boolean).

function: Display featured technical articles and solutions on the homepage.
static_description: The homepage shows two sections: 'Featured Articles' and 'Popular Solutions'. Each section displays a grid of cards with titles, summaries, authors, and publish dates. Cards use a consistent style with rounded corners and hover effects.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on an article card navigates to the article detail page. Clicking on a solution card navigates to the solution detail page.
Cards slightly elevate and show a shadow effect when hovered over.

resource_dependency.articlesDataSchema: Database table 'articles' with fields: id (UUID), title (string), content (text), author_id (foreign key to users.id), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp), tags (array of strings).

function: Allow users to browse technical articles with pagination or infinite scroll.
static_description: A dedicated page lists articles in a vertical feed. Each entry includes the title, excerpt, author name, publication date, and tags. Navigation controls appear at the bottom for pagination or a 'Load More' button for infinite scroll.

interaction_and_states.description: For infinite scroll, reaching near the end of the list triggers loading more articles via API call.
Clicking on an article title navigates to the detailed article view page.

function: Enable users to search technical information across articles and solutions.
static_description: A prominent search bar appears at the top of the site layout. It contains a text input field with a magnifying glass icon aligned right. Placeholder text says 'Search articles and solutions...'

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking inside the search bar focuses the input field.
Pressing Enter submits the current query to the backend search API endpoint and redirects to the search results page.

resource_dependency.articleDetailDataSchema: Same schema as articles but includes full 'content' field rendered as HTML.
resource_dependency.articleContentFormatter: Use markdown-to-HTML converter library like marked.js to render article content safely.

function: Present a detailed view of each technical article with properly formatted content.
static_description: Article detail page displays the title prominently, followed by metadata (author, publish/update date) and the main content area. Content supports headings, code blocks, images, links, and lists with appropriate styling.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can scroll through the entire article content vertically.
Clicking on embedded links opens them in a new tab.

resource_dependency.solutionsDataSchema: Database table 'solutions' with fields: id (UUID), title (string), problem_description (text), resolution_steps (text), category (string), author_id (foreign key to users.id), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp).

function: Provide a section for browsing and viewing solutions with filtering capabilities.
static_description: Solutions browsing page displays a filter sidebar on the left and a list of solution cards on the right. Filters include dropdowns for categories and sorting by date. Solution cards show title, brief problem statement, and category tag.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a filter option updates the displayed list dynamically by calling the filtered API endpoint.
Clicking a solution card navigates to its detailed view page.

resource_dependency.solutionDetailDataSchema: Same schema as solutions but with full 'problem_description' and 'resolution_steps' rendered as HTML.
resource_dependency.structuredPresentationStyle: Use distinct visual sections for Problem Statement and Resolution Steps with clear headers and spacing.

function: Show detailed view of each solution with structured presentation of problem and resolution.
static_description: Solution detail page presents the title first, then separates the content into two major sections: 'Problem Description' and 'Resolution Steps', each clearly labeled and visually distinct.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can read through the structured sections vertically.

resource_dependency.sessionManagementLibrary: Use express-session middleware for server-side sessions with cookie handling.
resource_dependency.userDatabaseTable: Table 'users': id (UUID), username (string), email (string, unique), password_hash (string), created_at (timestamp)

function: Implement user authentication system supporting registration, login, logout, and session management.
static_description: Login/Register modal or separate pages contain forms with inputs for credentials. Buttons for submitting actions. Links between login and register views.

interaction_and_states.description: Submit buttons trigger form validation and send data to respective backend auth endpoints. Successful login redirects to dashboard/homepage.
Logout button clears session and redirects to homepage.

resource_dependency.profileDataSchema: Includes user info + joined tables for authored_articles (count), contributed_solutions (count), messages_sent (count)

function: Display a user profile page showing authored articles, contributed solutions, and communication history.
static_description: Profile page has tabs for Overview, Authored Articles, Contributed Solutions, and Communication History. Default active tab is Overview which summarizes counts and recent activity.

interaction_and_states.description: Switching tabs loads corresponding data asynchronously without reloading the whole page.

resource_dependency.messageDatabaseTables: Tables: conversations(id), participants(conversation_id, user_id), messages(id, conversation_id, sender_id, content, timestamp)
resource_dependency.realTimeMessagingSupport: WebSocket integration needed for live message delivery.

function: Enable users to communicate with each other through private messaging or discussions.
static_description: Messaging interface resembles chat apps with a list of conversations on the left and selected conversation thread on the right. Message bubbles differentiate sent vs received.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a conversation loads its message history. Typing and sending messages adds them to the current thread in real time.
In message compose box, pressing Enter sends the typed message.

resource_dependency.commentDatabaseTable: Table 'comments': id (UUID), parent_type (enum: article/solution), parent_id (UUID), author_id (foreign key to users.id), content (text), created_at (timestamp)

function: Allow users to leave comments on articles and solutions for interaction.
static_description: Below the main content of articles/solutions, thereâ€™s a comments section. Existing comments are listed chronologically with author avatars, names, timestamps, and content. A form allows logged-in users to add new comments.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting a comment adds it to the list immediately after successful API response.

resource_dependency.databaseConnectionConfig: Use environment variables DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME for connecting to PostgreSQL.

function: Expose backend API endpoints for fetching articles, solutions, user data, and search results from PostgreSQL database.
static_description: RESTful API layer built using Node.js/Express exposing CRUD operations and specialized queries for articles, solutions, user profiles, and global search functionality.

resource_dependency.frontendHTTPClient: Axios or Fetch API used throughout React/Vue components to make authenticated requests.
resource_dependency.baseAPIUrlVariable: Define REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL in .env file pointing to backend base URL.

function: Ensure all frontend components fetch dynamic data exclusively through HTTP calls to backend APIs.
static_description: All dynamic content areas (articles list, solution details, user profile stats, etc.) initially display loading spinners before rendering fetched data.

resource_dependency.connectionPoolLibrary: pg-pool or similar to manage database connections efficiently.

function: Configure application environment to connect securely to PostgreSQL using predefined variables.
static_description: Environment configuration files (.env) store sensitive database credentials. Backend initializes connection pool during startup using these values.

resource_dependency.packageJsonScriptsDefinition: { "scripts": { "install:all": "concurrently \"cd client && npm install\" \"cd server && npm install\"", "dev": "concurrently \"cd client && npm run dev\" \"cd server && npm run dev\"" } }

function: Define package.json scripts to streamline installation and development workflow.
static_description: Root-level package.json defines custom commands to simplify multi-project setup and execution.

resource_dependency.responsiveDesignFramework: CSS media queries or utility-first frameworks like Tailwind CSS.

function: Ensure responsive design works seamlessly across desktop and mobile devices.
static_description: Layout adapts fluidly to different screen sizes. Navigation becomes collapsible hamburger menu on small screens. Font sizes and touch targets adjust accordingly.

interaction_and_states.description: Changing browser window size reflows layout elements appropriately using CSS breakpoints.
